org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search.lucene
Class MatchAllQuery

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search.lucene.MatchAllQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Serializable
class MatchAllQuery
extends org.apache.lucene.search.Query

Specialized query that returns / scores all pages in the search index.

Use this Query to perform a match '*'.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $, $Date: 2004/06/14 09:28:03 $
